alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tooele County through 630 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles south of Wendover to near Dugway English Village. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Dugway English Village, Utah Test and Training Range South, Delle, Knolls, Clive, Skull Valley, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
